text: In the 2011–12 season, ASO Chlef is competing in the Ligue 1 for the 25th season, as well as the Algerian Cup. It is their 8th consecutive season in the top flight of Algerian football. They will be competing in Ligue 1, the Algerian Cup and the Champions League. ==Squad list== Players and squad numbers last updated on 18 November 2011. Note: Flags indicate national team as has been defined under FIFA eligibility rules.
